notes.empty_search_term: Leaving search_term empty ('') will scrape all recent ads without filtering
notes.empty_country_code: Leaving country_code empty ('') will search ads from all countries
notes.country_codes_format: Use 2-letter ISO country codes (US, GB, CA, etc.)
notes.max_workers: Number of parallel browsers (5-10 recommended for best performance)
notes.max_ads_per_proxy: Maximum ads to collect per proxy before stopping (10-50 recommended)
notes.scroll_attempts: How many times to scroll down for more ads (5-15 recommended)

field_descriptions.advertiser: The name of the company/page running the ad
field_descriptions.media: Array of image/video URLs used in the ad
field_descriptions.date_scraped: ISO timestamp when the ad was scraped
field_descriptions.proxy: Proxy server used for scraping this ad
